name: multilinejavascriptconverter
description: Turns multiline text into safe JavaScript variables

scripts.setup: npm install -g mocha npx && npm install copyfiles -g && npm install -g delete && npm install -g mocha && npm install -g http-server && npm install -g node-sass && npm install -g babel && npm install -g browserify && npm install -g jshint
scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run jshint
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run html && npm run js && npm run favicon
scripts.js: npm run js:build && npm run js:compile
scripts.js:prod: npm run js:build && npm run js:compile:prod
scripts.deploy: echo 'jsstringconverter.bbody.io' > ./dist/CNAME && delete dist/js/script.js.map && npm run js:prod && gh-pages -d dist

author: Brendon Body
